headline: ALPHA SCIENTIFIC ELECTRONICS 315 kW CURRENT REGULATED POWER SUPPLY
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > DC Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Alpha Scientific Ele
Model Magnet Power Supply 315 kW
Maximum Output Voltage 143.00 Volts
Maximum Output Current 2,200.00 Amps
Maximum Output Power 315.00 kW
Regulation Modes Constant Current
Panel Meters Analog
External Cooling Water Cooled
Other Information Input: 480V, 3PH, 60Hz, 390 KVA
Output: 2200 Amps @ 143 VDC
Current Regulation: 0.1% of maximum
Voltage ripple: 120 MV RMS into resistive load
Design load inductance: 0.5 millihenries
Local current adjustment: 10 turn potentiometer
Remote current adjustment: 0-10VDC = 0-2200 Amps
Cooling: 12 GPM @ 35 PSID nominal



Extended Description Details at Alpfa Scientific 2200A 143V PS.pdf
Power Requirements 480 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 40.250 in (102.2 cm)
Depth 40.250 in (102.2 cm)
Height 77.250 in (196.2 cm)
Weight 2,800 lb (1,270 kg)
